description: With the right equipment and training Giant Orhat Beetles could be fitted with saddles and platforms, allowing a group of Scrubs to ride them like a transport.
tooltip: With the right equipment and training Giant Orhat Beetles could be fitted with saddles and platforms, allowing a group of Scrubs to ride them like a transport. (Giant Orhat Beetles can now upgrade themselves with Riding Platforms, allowing units to mount them)
